field.value:
I've written a patch to include NHibernate's "foreign-key" attribute for two of four relationship types. NHibernate documentation indicates that it supports specifying the foreign key name for the following:
<one-to-one> <many-to-one> <many-to-many> <key>
I was able to pretty quickly implement it for <one-to-one> and <many-to-one> but the others are a little more tricky. I don't know when I can get to the others so I wanted to at least get this patch in.
I updated the unit tests to insure that the attribute was included in the XML output.
